event.title: Join us for the first Bristol RISC-V Meetup!
event.description:
Join us for the first RISC-V Meetup in Bristol hosted by UltraSoC!

The evening will start with a networking session, including refreshments. We will have speakers from the University of Bristol, Imperas and UltraSoC, and we will end with a demo session.

Please secure your place and let us know you are coming. We look forward to seeing you there.

Please visit https://riscv.org/ for more information about RISC-V, and to read how, as a member of the RISC-V Foundation, UltraSoC is deeply involved in developing and defining the debug architecture for RISC-V standards visit https://www.ultrasoc.com/technology-2/risc-v/.
